events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail late last night.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the collision and damage reported.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle this auto accident claim promptly for customer assistance.
The customer has been informed that their auto accident claim is received and under review.
Request sent for the customer's vehicle registration, police report, and photos of the accident scene.
The customer submitted all requested documents including vehicle photos and the official accident report.
Investigation began to verify the circumstances and assess damages related to the car collision.
Investigation concluded showing no liability dispute and confirming the extent of damage to the vehicle.
A settlement amount was proposed covering the repair costs and other related expenses for the vehicle.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt settlement offer and the assistance from the agent.
The claim has been approved officially following agreement on the settlement terms with the customer.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim has been issued directly to the customer's preferred account.
The claim file has been closed after successful payment and confirmation from the customer.
All records related to the auto accident claim have been archived in compliance with company policies.
